translations.translation: llyas was one of the Messengers.
Verily Elias is one of the apostles.
Surely, Elias too was among the Messengers.
And indeed Ilyas is one of the Noble Messengers.
And verily, Ilyas was one of the Messengers.
And Ilyas was most surely of the apostles.
Elias too was one of the Envoys;
And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn),
Elijah too was one of the messengers.
And verily, llyas was one of the sent ones.
Indeed Ilyas was one of the apostles.
So also was Elias among those sent (by Us).
And verily, Iliyas (Elias) was one of the Messengers.
And Elias (El Yaseen) was among the Messengers.
Also Elijah was one of the messengers.
And indeed, Elias was from among the messengers,

[37:123] And truly Elias (read [wa-inna Ilyās] with the initial hamza or without [wa-inna’l-yāsa) was [also] one of the messengers. Some think that this [Elias] was the son of Aaron’s brother — [Aaron] the brother of Moses; but some say that this [Elias] was some other [person], who was sent to the people living in and around Baalbak.
(And lo! Elias was of those sent (to warn)) his folk.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { وَإِنَّ إِلْيَاسَ } ابن ياسين من أولاد هارون أخي موسى { لَمِنَ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ } [الصافات: 123] من عندنان المؤيدين بوحينا وإلهامنا
